title: Why The Gravekeeper Saint Decided To Get Married
alternative_title: 墓守聖女が結婚を決めたわけ; why the graveekeper saint want to get married?
status: 墓守聖女が結婚を決めたわけ; why the graveekeper saint want to get married?
description:
Description :
        Mikias, the "Gravekeeper Saint" hated by everyone, escapes from the Saint's Palace that binds her, and dreams of freedom, busily saving money.However, everything changes on the day she is suspected of assassinating another Saint, and the ruthless Prince Riddle proposes a "fake marriage" to achieve their mutual goals."It's not affection or love. I have no intention of taking anything away from you."In order to be free, Mikias becomes a fake fianc, but...
